If this is zero, the default, the number of bits per pixel is based on
the image. bounds-type enum sphere Specify the type of bounding volume that is created automatically by
Panda to enclose geometry. Use 'sphere' or 'box', or use 'best' to let
Panda decide which is most appropriate. You can also use 'fastest' if
you don't want Panda to waste much time computing the most optimal
bounding volume. buffer-viewer-layout string hline buffer-viewer-position string lrcorner buffer-viewer-size double 0 0 bullet-additional-damping bool 0 Enables additional damping on eachrigid body, in order to reduce
